title: Social Media Ethics Scenario-Based Microlearning

context.prior_knowledge: Basic social media usage experience, foundational concepts of professional ethics
context.additional_context: Mobile-optimized content for working professionals, designed with scenario-based learning reflecting real-life cases encountered in daily life.

learning_goals: Learners can identify five types of ethical dilemmas that may arise on social media.
Learners apply ethical decision-making processes in real-world scenarios through scenario analysis.
Learners can propose at least three legal/ethical requirements to consider when establishing social media policies within an organization.
difficulty: Moderate - Standard complexity with some constraints
